title: Three-component synthesis of pyran-fused biscoumarins: an entry to pyridinone- and pyranone-fused coumarins
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,14767-14774
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA01681E, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Jui-Ting Lee, Nagesh Jatangi, Sameer Vyasamudri, Ding-Yah Yang
A base-mediated, three-component synthesis of symmetric and unsymmetric pyran-fused biscoumarins via the coupling of 4-hydroxycoumarin with 4-chloro-3-formylcoumarin in ethanol is reported.
